name: Hell Castle Throne
description: The final chamber of Hell Castle. The skeletal guards Kroudin and Skress flank their master Grok, the Hell Lord. Defeat them to end the reign of terror.

modifiers.name: Essence Transfer
modifiers.description: When a character dies, their stats transfer to a random survivor, adding to the recipient's power.

modifiers.name: Healing Mana Flow
modifiers.description: Healing also restores 20% of the heal amount as mana.
